data.host: The ip-address of your Solaredge inverter
data.name: The prefix to be used for your SolarEdge sensors
data.port: The TCP port on which to connect to the SolarEdge inverter
data.read_meter_1: Read meter 1 data (only for meter models)
data.read_meter_2: Read meter 2 data (only for meter models)
data.read_meter_3: Read meter 3 data (only for meter models)
data.inverter1_unit: Unit number of the main inverter
data.inverter2_unit: Unit number of the first slave inverter (0 = deactivate)
data.inverter3_unit: Unit number of the second slave inverter (0 = deactivate)
data.read_storage: Read storage data (battery connected to main inverter)
data.scan_interval: The polling frequentie of the modbus registers in seconds
